headline: Lattice Semiconductor Considers Offer for Intel’s Altera Unit
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Lattice Semiconductor Corp. is considering making an offer for all of Intel Corp.’s Altera, people familiar with the matter said, in a twist that could complicate the chip giant’s plans to sell a minority stake in the unit. headline: AI Chips Update - Revolutionizing AI Integration with RISC-V Processors
summary: Ubitium, a hardware startup, has introduced a revolutionary universal RISC-V processor designed to enable advanced AI capabilities without needing specialized chips, thereby simplifying and cost-reducing embedded system architectures. This breakthrough challenges the longstanding industry reliance on specialized CPUs, GPUs, and other chips for various computing tasks, a paradigm prevalent since the 1960s. Ubitium's recent $3.7 million seed funding will support the development of prototypes,...
